data.title: Rounce Funeral Services - Cremation at Wealden Crematorium, Horam, Heathfield, East Sussex
data.meta_description: Discover compassionate and dignified cremation services at Wealden Crematorium in Horam, Heathfield, East Sussex, offered by Rounce Funeral Services. Transparent pricing, comprehensive packages, and local expertise. Contact us to discuss your unique needs during this emotional time.
data.text:
Transparent Pricing, Comprehensive Services

Understanding the financial considerations during such times, we break down the cost of our Cremation service into two components: Our Services (£1,495) and disbursements (3rd party costs). This clarity ensures that you are fully aware of where your money goes, making the process straightforward and manageable.

​

​

​

What's Included in Our Services for £1,495?

​

Our comprehensive services include:

​

Bringing your loved one into our care from a local hospital within a 15-mile radius of Worthing.

​

Visiting your loved one in our Chapel of Rest in Worthing.

​

Personal interview to receive your instructions.

​

All funeral and planning arrangements.

​

Arranging a convenient time and day for the funeral.

​

A standard sized Upton light oak effect coffin.

​

Provision of a black hearse and four pallbearers for the Wealden Crematorium cremation.

​

Personalized attention from your dedicated Funeral Director throughout the proceedings.

​

Guidance on the Registration of Death and completion of all legal necessities.

​

24-hour support and assistance leading up to the funeral.

​

Collection and distribution of floral tributes and charitable donations.

​

Arrangement of press notices.

​

​

​

What's not Included in Our Services?

Provision of a black hearse and four pallbearers for the ceremony at a different location such as a Church before a committal service at Wealden Crematorium, add £250.

​

Urgent Collection - If your loved one dies at home, in a care home or a hospice, add £250 and mileage.

​

Dressing - If you want your loved one dressed and comfortable in their own clothes, add £80.

​

Funeral Flowers - A floral tribute for the top of the coffin. Available from £45.

​

Credit - Payment must be made prior to the funeral unless agreed otherwise by Rounce.

​

​

​

Disbursements

Disbursements (third party payments paid on your behalf) may include:

​

A religious, non-religious, or semi-religious service conducted by either a Minister, a Priest, a Humanist, or a Celebrant (£250).

​

Doctor's Fee for a medical certificate for cremation (£82).

​

Cremation Fee which also includes: medical referee fee; environmental surcharge; hire of the ceremony hall for 45 minutes Monday to Friday; use of the Obitus music system; a cardboard container for cremated remains; one month’s storage of

cremated remains and unwitnessed scattering in the memorial garden if required. (£971).

​

Live streamed and 28-day watch again plus download link if required (£59).

​

Single photo Hold Image (£18).

​

Music Slideshow – up to 25 photos set to music played once during the service (£97).

​

Witnessed strewing of ashes in the garden of remembrance (£52).

​

​

​

Examples

Example 1

(a single time slot funeral ceremony and cremation service with music tributes)

​

A dignified cremation service at a time and day of your choice, including a hearse, pallbearers, an oak effect coffin, and a celebrant for a semi-religious service at Wealden Crematorium Chapel with music tributes, would cost:

​

Rounce Services £1,495.

Celebrant £250.

Doctor's Fee £82.

Cremation Fee including 45 minute Chapel service with music tributes £971.

Total £2,798.

​

​

​

Example 2

(a single time slot funeral ceremony and cremation service with music tributes, Single photo Hold image and Music Slideshow, Live streamed with 28 day watch again)

​

A dignified cremation service at a time and day of your choice, including a hearse, pallbearers, an oak effect coffin, and a celebrant for a semi-religious service at Wealden Crematorium Chapel with music tributes, Hold image, Music Slideshow and the event Live Streamed would cost:

​

Rounce Services £1,495.

Celebrant £250.

Doctor's Fee £82.

Cremation Fee including 45 minute Chapel service with music tributes £971.

Single photo Hold Image £18.

Music Slideshow – up to 25 photos set to music played once during the service £97.

Live streamed and 28-day watch again plus download link if required £59.

Total £2,972.

​

​

​

Pre-Payment Option

For added convenience and peace of mind, you can also choose to pre-pay for the Cremation at Wealden Crematorium for an additional £285.

​

At Rounce Funeral Services, we strive to provide a seamless and respectful farewell, honouring your loved one's memory with the care and attention they deserve. Contact us to discuss your unique needs and let us guide you through this challenging time.

Wealden Crematorium -

A Place of Serenity and Remembrance

Nestled in the serene countryside of Horam, East Sussex, Wealden Crematorium has been providing dignified funeral services since its establishment in 2019. Situated on Horam Road, their location offers easy accessibility, whether you're arriving by car or utilizing public transportation. With ample parking for 160 vehicles and a convenient waiting room, your visit is designed to be stress-free from the moment you arrive. While rooted in the heart of the Wealden District, their doors are open to all seeking a dignified space to honour and celebrate the lives of their cherished ones.

​

​

​

A Haven for Tranquil Reflection

Spanning 25 acres of meticulously landscaped grounds, Wealden Crematorium boasts expansive gardens, tranquil woodlands, and picturesque wildflower meadows. Carefully planned gardens and lush pastures create a peaceful ambiance, while nearly 8,000 trees and thousands of shrubs enhance the natural beauty of their surroundings. Their commitment to environmental sustainability is evident in every aspect of their green credentials, ensuring a harmonious blend of nature and reverence.

​

​

​

Visit Wealden Crematorium

Address: Wealden Crematorium, Horam Road, Horam, Heathfield, East Sussex TN21 0FX.

If you’re using a Sat Nav – the best postcode to use is TN21 0LH.

Telephone: 01323 443400

​

​

Website: https://www.wealdencrematorium.co.uk

​

​

Email: crematorium@wealden.gov.uk

​

​

​

A Place of Memories and Music

At Wealden Crematorium, the state-of-the-art ceremony hall is the largest in the local area, comfortably seating over 120 mourners with ample standing room. The hall is a light and spacious building which has a full length glass wall on the south side which looks out over the reflection pool to the Flower Court and the Garden of Remembrance. Equipped with a 75-inch screen for enhanced visual tributes and photos, the hall provides a dignified space to honour your loved one's life.

From professional photographic tributes to personalized engraved leaves on their iconic tree, they offer a variety of memorial options to commemorate your loved ones' memory with respect and distinction. Additionally, funeral services are relayed outside via screens and speakers for larger attendances, ensuring everyone can participate in the farewell.

​

​

​

Opening Times and Amenities

Opening Hours: Monday to Friday: 8.30 AM to 5:00 PM

Amenities:

Parking Facilities: The crematorium boasts ample parking space, accommodating up to 160 vehicles, with dedicated accessible parking spots for added convenience.

Comfortable Waiting Area: Visitors can find solace in the welcoming waiting room, providing a peaceful environment for reflection and contemplation.

Restroom Facilities: Ample restroom facilities, including accessible toilets and baby change stations, are available to cater to the needs of all guests.

Pet-Friendly Environment: Recognizing the importance of furry companions, the crematorium warmly welcomes well-behaved dogs, allowing families to include their pets in the farewell process.

Accessibility Features: With hearing loop facilities and a disability-friendly design, the crematorium ensures inclusivity and accessibility for individuals with diverse needs.

Warm Hospitality: The dedicated staff at Wealden Crematorium extend a friendly and compassionate welcome to all visitors, providing support and assistance during their time of need.

Whether attending a service or seeking a moment of solace amidst the tranquil surroundings, guests can expect a welcoming and accommodating experience at Wealden Crematorium.
